00011 using namespace std;
00012 
00013 //Описание формата https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tar_(computing)
00014 //----------- Tar --------------------
00015 //Field offset  Field size      Field
00016 //0     100     File name
00017 //100   8       File mode
00018 //108   8       Owner's numeric user ID
00019 //116   8       Group's numeric user ID
00020 //124   12      File size in bytes(octal base)
00021 //136   12      Last modification time in numeric Unix time format(octal)
00022 //148   8       Checksum for header record
00023 //156   1       Link indicator(file type)
00024 //157   100     Name of linked file
00025 
00026 //--------USTAR--------
00027 //0     156     (several fields, same as in old format)
00028 //156   1       Type flag
00029 //157   100     (same field as in old format)
00030 //257   6       UStar indicator "ustar" then NUL
00031 //263   2       UStar version "00"
00032 //265   32      Owner user name
00033 //297   32      Owner group name
00034 //329   8       Device major number
00035 //337   8       Device minor number
00036 //345   155     Filename prefix
00037 
00038 struct tarheader {
00039         char filename[100];
00040         char filemode[8];
00041         char userid[8];
00042         char groupid[8];
00043         char filesize[12];
00044         char modiftime[12];
00045         char checksum[8];
00046         char filetype[1];
00047         char linkname[100];
00048 
00049         char indicator[6];
00050         char version[2];
00051         char username[32];
00052         char groupname[32];
00053         char majornumber[8];
00054         char minornumber[8];
00055         char prefix[155];
00056         char pad[12];
00057 };
00058

00060 protected:
00061         std::FILE* out;
00062         bool _finished;
00063         bool _closeFile;

00066         void _size(void* header, unsigned long fileSize);
00067         void _filename(void* header, const char* filename);
00068         void _endRecord(std::size_t len);
00069         long int fileLength(std::FILE *file);
00070 private:
00071         ifstream inputStream;
00072 
00073 
00074 public:
00075         Tar(const char *filename);
00076         virtual ~Tar();
00077         void close();
00078         void add_to_empty(const char* filename, const char* content);
00079         void add_to_archive(const char* filename, const char* nameInArchive);
00080 
00081         void Tar::untar(FILE *a, const char *name);
00082         int Tar::extract(char *tarFileName);

00084         FILE *Tar::create_file(char *name);
